Class.name: Stats.KPI.InputTotalByTestName
Class.Description: KPI to show total messages received/sent Ensemble production each day.

Parameter.name: SrcVer
Parameter.Description: Location and Revision of this file in Perforce (Auto-updating)

XData.name: KPI
XData.Data:
<kpi name="InputTotalByTestName" sourceType="sql"> <filter name="TestName" sql="select distinct %exact(TestName) from Stats_Data.InputByTime"/>
<property name="TotalMessages" columnNo="2" /> <property name="TotalTime" columnNo="3" /> <property name="AvgMsg" columnNo="4" /> </kpi>

Method.name: %OnGetSQL
